title: Launch malfunction
body: After downloading the patch, The launch turned grey and I found at the right upper corner near the North America it said it was unavailable

replies.body:
We had some issues with the Login Service after the patch rolled out. The issue has since been resolved and if you restart your client, you should be able to log in.

Let me know if you still have issues with login.

Just a malfunction. This is unintended.

Pretty sure the game is just fine and the bright yellow box saying Riot is trying to fix some problems is a lie.
Look for a post titled "riot compensation for downed server" and spread the word
